title: 25. Would You Rather See a Computer or a Doctor?
description: Well, which is better at predicting your risk of having a heart attack? Bapu Jena explores the promise — and perils — of artificial intelligence in medicine.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
